tweet_text:
@migizla @Liberty_Nashun @blast703 @BenisKen @TheAngelKing47 Just say that you don't know anything about guns.

FYI - my friend was killed when we were teens. Her boyfriend shot her in the chest with an "unloaded" shotgun, which of course ended up being loaded. It's why we teach that "every gun is a loaded gun."
